title: Wordpress DIY Small Business Website Tutorial
description:
Wordpress DIY Small Business Website Tutorial


Want to build a website for your small business? Do it
yourself (DIY) with WordPress. In this course, Morten
Rand-Hendriksen shows how to create a website complete with
a contact form, social sharing buttons, a
booking/availability calendar, and a photo gallery. He
walks through every step in the process: from site planning
and finding the right plugins, to installing a new theme
and customizing the appearance of your site to match your
brand. Plus, get tips for prepping and sharing your site
with the world

Find more courses in this series in our WordPress DIY
playlist

Topics include:

* Establishing the goals for the site

* Making a content inventory

* Adding a custom menu

* Choosing a theme and plugins

* Customizing the front page

* Adding promotions

* Setting up a contact form, calendar, and social media
buttons * Securing your site and managing spam
